WorkItem.Description:
Start typing 

var x = (22/7).

After the period, expecting to see Number object functions.  They won't work.

However by adding a semicolon at the end before typing any method name, shows intellisense after the period

var x = (22/7). ;

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting this issue. It appears to have been fixed post-release. You should see the correct behavior in later builds.
